body.p: At 31 March 20X9 (the measurement date) the junior tranche is now A‑rated. This tranche of the residential mortgage‑backed security was previously traded through a brokered market. However, trading volume in that market was infrequent, with only a few transactions taking place per month from 1 January 20X8 to 30 June 20X8 and little, if any, trading activity during the nine months before 31 March 20X9.
